citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:05 am on
12-Jul-17.
Arrived at facility . There were no cars in driveway and no one answered the door . Called licensee and daughter
and there was no answer at either number. Left message to call the USDA inspector.

narrative:

and there was no answer at either number. Left message to call the USDA inspector.
